thread.title: Louis van Gaal suffered 'awful' fortnight after Manchester United's Arsenal loss - Braintree and Witham Times
thread.title_full: Louis van Gaal suffered 'awful' fortnight after Manchester United's Arsenal loss - Braintree and Witham Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Braintree and Witham Times
title: Louis van Gaal suffered 'awful' fortnight after Manchester United's Arsenal loss - Braintree and Witham Times
text:
Louis van Gaal has called on his players to end the "awful" feeling he has endured since he watched Manchester United crumble to a 3-0 defeat at Arsenal a fortnight ago. Van Gaal had taken United to the top of the Barclays Premier League following a run of three straight wins, but the Dutchman suffered a blow on the eve of the international break when his team were easily beaten by Arsenal.
 Braintree and Witham Times.
